title: Incorrect "Build" popup action enablement
description: The "Build" action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective is always enabled, even if the user goes to Preferences -> Workbench and selects "Perform build automatically on resource modification". The build menu option should not appear in the Java popup menus when this preference is enabled.
OB: The "Build" action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective is always enabled, even if the user goes to Preferences -> Workbench and selects "Perform build automatically on resource modification". The build menu option still appears in the Java popup menus.
EB: The "Build" action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective should be disabled if the user goes to Preferences -> Workbench and selects "Perform build automatically on resource modification". The build menu option should not appear in the Java popup menus when this preference is enabled.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Go to Preferences -> Workbench.
2. Select "Perform build automatically on resource modification".
3. Open the Java perspective.
4. Right-click on any Java file to open the context-sensitive popup menu.
5. Verify that the "Build" action is still enabled and the build menu option appears in the Java popup menus.
